name: Occult Prototype
description:
Controls:

Q, W, E, A, S, D to move.
F for menu.
RIGHT CLICK/LEFT CLICK to select.
MOUSE WHEEL to zoom in/out.

Version 0.5 Alpha:

Ever wanted to live the dream of conquering the final frontier?

This half mini-game is just to test the waters. Further development depends on your support! Please download the attached PDF file (coming soon!) to get further information on how you can support the project and all the things I have planned for it.

Other than that, I hope you have fun :)
